title: Is a tenor sax a low reed instrument? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’d say the name implies it’s placement. Choral voices are Soprano, Alto, Tenor and Bass. Basses of course being the low voices. Tenors, then, are a middle voice, with the Baritone Saxophone being the frequent low voice in Saxophone writing. The Bass Saxophone, if available can also of course be the low voice.
